commit.message:
h8300.md (*andorqi3): Use bor between bld and bst.

	* config/h8300/h8300.md (*andorqi3): Use bor between bld and
	bst.  Update the insn length.
	(*andorhi3): Likewise.
	(*andorsi3): Likewise.

From-SVN: r59225

files.patch:
